title: Episode 90 - Segregation De Jure
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
In this episode, we examine what racism looked like in the rest of the United States outside of the south. We examine red-lining and US housing policy that built a virtual system of segregation in the rest of the United States.
